org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

Class TestAdmin2

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestAdminBase
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestAdmin2

  • public class TestAdmin2
extends TestAdminBase
    Class to test HBaseAdmin. Spins up the minicluster once at test start and then takes it down afterward. Add any testing of HBaseAdmin functionality here.
